title: Cosine as a Ratio
description: An interactive MicroSim demonstrating how the cosine function can be visualized as the ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse in a right triangle.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Geometry
Trigonometry
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of cosine as a ratio
Apply cosine as a ratio to solve problems
Visualize and interpret cosine as a ratio relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on cosine as a ratio
